item.title: Features
item.description: File chooser Default file View markdown in browser or html viewer Regular expression text search Character set detection and selection Optional syntax highlighting Open recent files from menu Optionally view files Optional auto save Optional Word wrap New file shortcut Light/Dark/Black/Retro themes Small/Medium/Large font size Monospace/Proportional font faces
